body.p: OpenSeaMap Viewer depends on the data of the OpenSeaMap project.
The data on the map may be outdated or may not show all seamarks
Do not use it for Navigation
This software depends highly on the mapsforge library, thanks to the guys who developed it
The library is a part of the mapsforge project and distributed under the LGPL3 license.
Map data Â© OpenStreetMap contributors, CC-BY-SA.
Please report all bugs and feature requests concerning the base map either via our issue tracker or our public mapsforge-dev mailing list.
